website_summaries.verdict: Pure oil that soaks into your skin with soothing fats that help restore plumpness and youthful skin.
pros: A gentle option if new to holistic skincare
Non-comedogenic and known to improve skin conditions ranging from acne to wrinkles
We love that it doesn't clog your pores
Helps repair split ends as well
cons: Doesn't perform miracles, however can provide immediate health benefits

customer_reviews.title: The Best Moisturizer Ever
customer_reviews.text: I've found Grapeseed Oil to be the Best facial moisturizer ever. After I cleanse my skin , I apply the Grapeseed Oil to my damp face and it leaves my skin so smooth , soft and clear. One would think I have on a thin coat of Foundation. All I wear is Eyebrow Pencil!!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Robinson

customer_reviews.title: It’s the real deal!!
customer_reviews.text: After just one week of use, my old, wrinkled, rosacea-prone skin looks TONS better! Of course, wrinkles don’t just disappear, but this oil helps diminish them. Rosacea? Hasn’t been this calm in a long time. Skin is softer. On my psoriatic patch on my elbow, this oil reduced and soltened the plaques. I know I sound like a shill, but I am dead serious about this product! I would pay big bucks for this, but the price is amazing for the many benefits. I know there are many other grapeseed oils, but quality is the essential factor.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome as a carrier oil - helps with acne
customer_reviews.text: I love using this grapeseed oil as a carrier oil. I make my own nightly facial oil, using a couple essential oils with the Maple Holistics grapeseed oil, and it works wonders for my skin! Before, I was using a rosehip seed oil as the carrier oil - it worked fine, but i've noticed marketable improvement with my skin, specifically less breakouts, by using the grapeseed oil. I highly recommend this for anyone with acne concerns!
customer_reviews.author: L. L.

customer_reviews.title: Grapeseed The Way to Go
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to one of my grand children to help with his acne. I heard on the internet about the quality of Maple Holistics products. Grapeseed Oil is all natural and can really help with things such as acne. If it were my choice, I would like to see more natural acne fighting products on shelves and in stores. We noticed results on his face within a few days. It seems like the quality of the oil is really good. I'll a quality oil is really the main thing to look for when purchasing anything from this product type.
customer_reviews.author: Padmaja

customer_reviews.title: great natural beauty necessity
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil... I use it on my face, lips and my whole body. Mix it with my favorite face serum and body lotion sometimes. Many benefits but mostly it has helped me use less makeup since my complexion is more even and I somehow have little to no more breakouts. I have had issues with adult acne... plus weird itchy face rash I thought was eczema or rosacea. I use a combination of organic rose-hip seed oil & grape-seed oil after cleansing my face. Been doing this the last few months. It works. This is few of the items I know I’ll definitely keep reordering from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rissa Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my face after my shower and have noticed a significant reduction in wrinkles on my face. I also use grapeseed oil on my feet as well after my shower then put on socks. The dry cracking feet that I once had have gone away. I have used many lotions that claim to heal the feet, but nothing has worked except the grapeseed oil! Amazing!! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Face Oil; Needs New Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this oil as a makeup remover at the end of a long day. It got almost everything, all but some residual mascara that never seems to come off all the way anyway! It also leaves my skin incredibly soft and doesnt break me out. My only issue with this product is how its packaged. Because of the wide opening, a lot spills out before I have time to react. I feel like I've wasted a lot of the product and it would've lasted me longer if it had a pump or dropper. Besides that, great face oil!
customer_reviews.author: Barb Rivard

customer_reviews.title: Youthful appearance in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: Use it every other evening usually on my face. It's almost like magic. Just a couple drops, rub on my face. Finer lines disappear and my skin appears rejuvenated. Living in the notrheast, skin tends to dry out over the winter. Maple Holistics Grapeseed Oil helped keep my skin hydrated. The biggest deal for me though is I have a few blood vessels starting to show up on my skin. This seems to help with that. The bottle has a generous amount in it. A single bottle will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Czajkowski

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: As a gal with terrible acne that requires tretinoin and other things that dry my skin out, this is actual magic. A little goes a long way and my skin has never looked better. It doesn’t make me break out, it doesn’t smell, and moisturizes my skin beautifully. Better than the expensive oils like Sunday Riley.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great for the skin, internally and externally
customer_reviews.text: First off, I'm a 30 year old guy. I think this is a great product, worked absolutely amazing as a moisturizer. Thought it made my face completion much brighter, even though that wasn't the aim. I take 5-6 drops morning and night in a small water, I think this has really helped me moisturize my skin with the right type of fat from the inside out. Otherwise, if I eat poor quality fat, my skin feels dirty and looks dull and dry. *** would have gave this item 5 stars but unfortunately my bottle spilt during the shipping process.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, esp. for skin brightening
customer_reviews.text: I was becoming suspicious of the "miraculous" properties of this product in other reviews when I noticed that the dark spots on my hands have become noticeably lighter since using grapeseed oil. I also use it on face, neck, and chest and mix it into my other products, especially retinol-based creams, which can be drying. It's true that the skin more easily absorbs this oil than the other oils I've used like castor oil and hemp oil, both of which have great properties for the skin but leave oilier film. Yes, this is a great product for the price, and I'm going to start using it more liberally!
customer_reviews.author: L. Borgia

customer_reviews.title: Plastic bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Oil was just ok. I did not like that it was in a plastic bottle. I used sparingly & it only lasted two weeks. No visible results of any changes. A card came w the shipment offering a free product, I did as the instructions stated & to date haven’t received anything. Maybe the product wasn’t used enough to notice any benefits but the product didn’t go to far.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great skin care oil
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product from my aesthetician's recommendation. She said that this would be a great skin cleanser especially for my oily skin - what she did not tell me is that I still needed to rinse it off with another cleanser. I have not tried using this as a moisturizer like what the other reviewers have done. It does give my skin the plump look and alleviated the dry patches on my face. Would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Owen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much to like about this product except the price point. Nonetheless, you do get what you pay for. I was out of grapeseed oil and short on cash so I bought this. It isn't a good grapeseed oil. It doesn't have consistency or color of a good oil. I'm very diappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Loubell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS GRAPESEED OIL!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I both have curly hair, hers is short and mine is long. We use this oil on our curls to keep them tamed down and make our hair shine! It is a very light oil, so it doesn't weigh our hair down, nor does it make it greasy feeling! I also just rub the remaining oil into my hands and cuticles! We love this product and especially the fact that it is non-toxic! Can't wait to try other products by this company.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A. Gose

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: This product is simple; simply perfect The scent is natural and I appreciate that I need an oil that calms the skin is soothing and avoids all irritants It is light and effective in soothing and healing my damaged skin barrier and adult acne Such a great product A YouTube blogger slash genius put me on to this!!
customer_reviews.author: Nycole

customer_reviews.title: Best body oil to combat Winter skin
customer_reviews.text: The pure grapeseed oil is the best and most emollient oil for moisturizing skin. Applied to towel dried skin after a bath, this topical treatment will leave skin supple and not greasy. The oil seems to penetrate the skin immediately. I’ve been using it or several months now and appreciate a smoother feel for my skin without any dryness.
customer_reviews.author: AKA farm girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This grapeseed oil is excellent. I use it to make my own lotions as a carrier oil & it has worked wonderfully. I have a lot of allergies with products sold in stores so I started making my own & I am very happy with what I make. This oil is odorless so it doesn't clash with essential oils that I use with it. I use it as a carrier oil. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: GRock

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Have tried several grapeseed oils, but found Maple Holistics as one of the best ones. Size is perfect for me as I use several drops and mix with my regular lotion. Goes a long way and moisturizes your skin better. There is no real smell which is even better when adding it to your lotions. In addition, found other brands where the it smelled rancid and this one did not. Will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: tried this product before through a friend and like the way it made my skin feel
customer_reviews.text: tried this product before through a friend and like the way it made my skin feel. my son suffers from severe acne and he's now 24. its damaged his skin white a bit. after using this product for a month i seen him yesterday and couldn't believe that something finally worked for his skin. i would say about 33% of his acne is healed. hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey P.

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs well
customer_reviews.text: Was leaking a little bit upon arrival. Nice lightweight oil that absorbs well. I still found it to break me out like most other oils I have used. I now just use it on my hands and the ends of my hair when needed but I will probably not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Brookshire

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer and absorbs quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I originally began using this product after it was applied to my face after a dermaplane treatment. It felt wonderful! I purchased this grape seed oil and began using after home facial treatments. I love the way my skin feels and looks with this treatment. I also put it on my nails and cuticles every night and the dry skin has disappeared. A little goes a long way and I will continue to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my skin!
customer_reviews.text: After trying several different oils to use as a base to do the oil cleansing method on my face and not having great results, someone suggested grape seed oil. I bought this brand and have been thrilled! I've used it for over a year now, and my skin has looked better than ever. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: RPG

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: My only thing is that the bottle leaked for me, so I couldn’t use most of it because a lot of it leaked out. It’s EXTREMELY heavy, but I used it as a hot-oil treatment, so it was washed out with shampoo after the treatment was done! Doesn’t smell like anything, but I thought it worked the way it says it would.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Teniente

customer_reviews.title: Great for your face
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product as part of regime, for over a year, to help keep my face moisturized especially in the cold winter months. This product absorbs into my skin quickly and doesn't leave any oily or residual product after it gets absorbed. Exactly what I was looking for no more and no less. This is a staple for me and I recommend looking into it for your own skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Jet Black

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer, Nice and Light
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try grapeseed oil after reading articles that it can reduce/prevent the appearance of wrinkles. I purchased this brand because it is cold pressed with no added chemicals. I was a little nervous about putting an oil on my face. I thought that it might break it out. I was pleasantly surprised that the grapeseed oil is light and moisturizes better than any lotion I have tried! I had no additional breakouts. I will definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: product seems good
customer_reviews.text: would have been nice if it hadnt leaked all over my entire order . The bottle lid was loose and the seal didn't keep it from leaking. Bottle half empty when I received it. Whole order was a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Best skin oil I have used!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best oils I have ever used on my skin. It’s very light and absorbs easily. My skin glows, my makeup goes on so easily. I also use it on my hair and nails. I have reordered several times and just wish it in a larger bottle. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jent

customer_reviews.title: Grapeseed 100% pure oil
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was pure grapeseed oil it didn't have a scent to it, the liquid itself appeared to be clear? I used it on my face and hair. Didn't really see much of a difference in it's affect so I most likely won't purchase again unless I don't have any other options.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: This has replaced my face lotion
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this grapeseed oil for several months. Only a small amount is needed and the scent is light. I use it for my face and neck and no longer use a facial moisturizer/lotion. I love the way it makes my skin feel and how it evens out my skin tone. It has not caused breakouts. Highly recommend giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisB

customer_reviews.title: Great discovery for dry hair
customer_reviews.text: This oil is absolutely fantastic for hair and face! I began using it around my eyes and mouth to soften wrinkles because I needed a natural moisturizer. But afterk i8 telling my hair stylist about my dry hair, she suggested using grapeseed oil on the ends. Wow! What a difference! My hair is smoother and shiny. A little goes a long way. Wish I had found this product long ago!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my DYO Face Serum
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin and after much research I decided to order the grapeseed oil. I added essential oils to it to make my own face serum. It absorbs quickly into the skin and my face is glowing the next day. I only apply it at night. Always look for cold pressed and refined grapeseed oil as the one that Maple Holistics is supplying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of goodness in this
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! Keeps my skin looking young and smooth, I think it even tightens skin too. Excellent source of vitamin E and omega 6’s. Can be used to remove makeup and even treats dandruff
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bottle so I could keep my skin hydrated at Burning Man in the Black Rock Desert, where the alkaline sand aka "playa dust" can be extremely drying and cause Playa Foot (I hear it's painful!). The grapefruit seed oil had minimal scent, was quick to dry, and kept my skin insulated with moisture for hours. I also used it to moisturizing the ends of my hair and it has succeeded in doing so without creating that "wet" look from overly oiled up hair.
customer_reviews.author: cjm515

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We have used a lot of different products on our daughters sensitive skin in hopes to heal the dryness caused by eczema, but it wasn’t until we started using this product that we saw great results. We are using this along with her other skincare routine and it is working perfectly to help seal in moisture and rejuvenate her skin. It absorbs quickly leaning her skin feeling silky and smooth. Well done! Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Boxerlover

customer_reviews.title: God send
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this item for butt acne but while reading the reviews I came across many that talked about using it on their face as well. I decided I would give it a try and I couldn’t be happier. I apply it morning and night after my cleansing/toning routine and before moisturizer/spf in the morning. Just a little dime size is enough for the face without leaving it oily. I’ve also noticed my skin looking more even toned as well as my wrinkles have slightly minimized. With all honesty I could recommend this product more.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great oil
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite carrier oil. Really not much of a scent, which I like, as it doesn't fight with other oils I add. Easy to rub into skin without residue. Nice packaging. A big yes for those use herbal oils.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Facial moisturizer dry, sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this grapeseed oil on my face at night for my incredibly dry and sensitive (rosacea-prone) skin. (I am in my early 50s, but my 15-year-old daughter with dry, sensitive skin uses it on her face, too.) It feels rich going on, absorbs fairly quickly, and leaves my skin feeling soft and supple. I don't use it much during the day (not around the eye area anyway) because it can make eye makeup smear. But otherwise I love the product!
customer_reviews.author: L. Cleary

customer_reviews.title: I have never felt so comfortable in my skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought the grapeseed oil because I have rough hands. My hands easily dry and often need to be moisturized. With this grapeseed oil, I am able to moisturize them and they will stay soft and will not get dry throughout the day. My brother has acne and he has tried the grapeseed oil too. He saw results in a small amount of time. His face was clearer and the acne had severely lessened. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Syed A. Tahami

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I use this each morning on my face as a moisturizer as soon as I get out of the shower. It’s great and doesn’t leave me feeling greasy. I have fewer breakouts and my face feels softer!
customer_reviews.author: J Cler

customer_reviews.title: Grapeseed oil isn't just for cooking
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my hair and skin. I love how in the hair, it isn't oily and it goes straight into the skin. I buy other grade for cooking, but grapeseed oil is my new go to oil. I have used coconut oil for years, so very pleased using it as part of my beauty regiment.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: REALLY help my acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: My very first review. I started using this grapeseed oil as makeup removal about two weeks ago. I have had adult acne for many years now. This oil does a much better job in removing makeup than any other product I have used. I was getting around 1-2 acne every week or so before I started using this product. I have not had any more breakout since the day I started using the oil. I really cannot believe it. The 4 cysts I had at the time I started the oil are also healing and going away. I am going to update my progress in a few month, but definitely going to order another bottle when this one runs out.
customer_reviews.author: aggiemom

customer_reviews.title: Clearning fruits
customer_reviews.text: I know this was for the face, but I really bought it for cleaning purposes-fruits especially. I heard grapeseed oil is great for cleaning of fruit wax. I tried using 10 drop initially with a small container of water. It did help but the best is to add about 20 drop and leave fruits longer in water then rinse for best result. I am much happier that the waxy stuff on my apples (even though "people" say its safe. I am going to try it with my daughter and her acne soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you want a natural moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: I love how light and moisturizing this product is. I have very sensitive skin and I am able to use this on my face. It actually helped to clear up the little bit of acne that I had when I started using it and prevented breakouts during my period. I will definitely order again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Liz from SA

customer_reviews.title: Great moisture boost for skin/hair/nails
customer_reviews.text: This oil is so lovely! Works wonders for adding the right amount of moisture to my very dry skin/hair/nails during the Northeast winters. As a pro makeup artist, this also works like magic in my kit for a multitude of uses on every skin type. Not too heavy, not too light, works very well mixed into your moisturizer and hair conditioner for an added boost. Would love to see the packaging changed to a dropper bottle or pump tube!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders for acne and as moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: A friend at work told me I should try grapeseed oil for my adult acne on my chin. It was worked wonders for me. I also deal with keratosis pilaris on the back of the arms. I use this daily to help moisturize my dry skin. You can also use a small amount on your hair for fly aways.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Evangelista

customer_reviews.title: Yikes
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me at all... I’m a dude that’s into skincare and this totally screwed my face up. Slowly worked it into my daily routine and started breaking out like crazy. It legitimately took months for my skin to get back to normal, and I just had to write a review five months later because it was so triggering. Might work for you but definitely didn’t work for me and I have combination skin... if I could give this product zero stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s not too oily. It’s absorbs well into the skin. I use it morning and night as a facial massage oil. Along with the gentle facial massage, it helps boost collagen. My age spots have also lightened up since using. I haven’t had to wear foundation in a month. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome oil, absorbs easily
customer_reviews.text: Got this oil about 3months ago to use as a moisturizer for my little girls hair. Its lightweight, absorbs easily and doesn't leave any oily residue after use. Leaves hair really moisturized and healthy after use. Delivery was on time. Am Surely buying again. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: F.s

customer_reviews.title: It only takes a few drops and spreads easily. I would highly recommend this.  PLEASE LEAVE MY LAST NAME OFF OF THE REVIEW I SEN
customer_reviews.text: The company and Amazon was very cooperative in solving the problem that a small amt of the oil came out in the shipping box when a large item and the oil were shipped together by Amazon. I have been putting this on my face and neck in the evening after I shower for the past 2 wks. I have noticed my wrinkles, rosacea and dryness have decreased quite a bit. It only takes a few drops and spreads easily. I would highly recommend this.PLEASE LEAVE MY LAST NAME OFF OF THE REVIEW I SENT RECENTLY.
customer_reviews.author: Prefer to list only my first name and not my last please. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: I just purchased this product based on reviews. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this product based on reviews. I have this pimple that doesn't dry out for more than a week and no product would help. I read about grapeseed oil and its' benefits so I gave it a try. I used it last night. My pimple has dried out, the inflammation is gone and my face feels softer and moisturized. I will definitely continue using this.
customer_reviews.author: Al G.

customer_reviews.title: Go to carrier oil
customer_reviews.text: Grapeseed Oil is my go to carrier oil for essential oil dermatological application. Absorbs fast and is non comedogenic. Loaded with anti-inflammatory and antioxidant activity. This version is of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence from Hackensack

customer_reviews.title: A must have oil..
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my hair. I see that after using this oil my hair has thickened and it is not falling out anymore. My mom uses it for her face and says that it has made her face more shinier and even toned after just a few uses. We are sending two bottles to my grandma now.
customer_reviews.author: Goddess

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is awesome! i use it in my shampoo to help ...
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is awesome! i use it in my shampoo to help thicken my hair, and it has definitely helped! I will be ordering more soon
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this product. First it healed a small blemish on my upper lip. Plus, it is silky smooth. Second I tried it on my big toe, after I had taken my polish off earlier this year I found that the nail had turned white due to wearing the polish too long. Well I put teatree oil on it and then rubbed in the Grapeseed oil...the Grapeseed oil moisturized enough to take away the white on my nail. This will always be in my oil collection
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Impressed what I got 4 $10
customer_reviews.text: The title sums up how I feel about this oil. It smells great and leaves my skin feeling silky with a low or no scent and has replaced jojoba as my new carrier oil because its awesome and a little goes a long way. I'm definitely going to be regularly getting this oil. Maple holistics seems like a good brand i can trust and they have great customer service, i think they'll give you a refund if you don't like any of their products and reach out to them about it.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita l.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product my bottle was busted, I'm a user of grape seed oil.
customer_reviews.author: theresa de'jarnette

customer_reviews.title: Heals fast
customer_reviews.text: My spa gave me a sample to use on my eyebrows as I got micro blading. This product soothed my brows and they healed quickly. I bought my own bottle and use it on my face, arms and elbows. Great for dry skin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Key to perfect skin
customer_reviews.text: I am actually pretty amazed by the result after using the product consistently for some weeks. My skin looks so brighter, smooth and youthful. It is actually much better than most highly priced skin care products. I had read somewhere that grapeseed oil has the biggest amount of antioxidants and vitamins found in any oil - and I can definitely tell! I am also happy about the affordable price. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tutku

customer_reviews.title: Best oil for my face!
customer_reviews.text: My friend who is a make up artist and does my make up from time to time bought this for me because I would complain to her and tell her my face is always dry, especially in the winter time. And man, this is the best product I've ever used to moisturize my face! It's soft and it's not a heavy based oil either. I'm so glad she got this for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shan~Shan

customer_reviews.title: Love the sheen and texture
customer_reviews.text: I use this product along with coconut oil on my natural hair. Love the sheen and texture!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Oil
customer_reviews.text: Maple Holistics Grapeseed oil is something of a mystery. An an excellent one at that. How could this scentless and ordinary looking oil be so effective as a moisturizer ? There are so many expensive products out there with many ingredients. We have tried many of them over the years. Yet none have been more effective than this product which has only one ingredient !
customer_reviews.author: no pain 'n the neck

customer_reviews.title: Healing
customer_reviews.text: Proanthocyanidin a compound in Grape seed extract oil is very high in antioxidant and has proven to heal wounds much faster by bringing more oxygen to the cells. I used Maple Holistics oil every day to massage my surgical scar and over 4 weeks , now I hardly have any scar tissue, and wound has healed completely. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: mysticP

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and pleasant
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was fantastic. It was not greasy and it worked very well with my essential oils. It is also lasting a very long time. I have used it in my hair, on my face and all over my body.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Reduces appearance of wrinkles! 🍇
customer_reviews.text: I had read so much about adding grape seed oil to your beauty regimen so I decided to give it a try. I purchased it for my face and my chest wrinkles. It penetrates skin quickly and doesn’t leave your skin feeling oily. Summers in the south can get pretty hot and I have really noticed a difference in my skin staying hydrated and the wrinkles on my chest area are not as noticeable. Highly recommend trying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil!
customer_reviews.text: I had heard from a friend that pure grapeseed oil was great for your skin - and she was right! It is very nourishing and moisturizing. I can tell the oil is of high quality because of the way it absorbs into my skin. It does not feel "oily" at all! It's been a wonderful, MUCH cheaper alternative to night creams and I am so glad to have found a brand I love.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: She said it is a good moisturizer at night and leaves her skin feeling very ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this product. She said it is a good moisturizer at night and leaves her skin feeling very smooth. She doesn't use it for daytime use, however, because she prefers to use a lightweight moisturizing lotion with SPF 30. She has problems with acne and this product did not seem to exacerbate it. She said it doesn't necessarily help her acne but it has not increased it either.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over a month now and it works great as a moustirizer (i have combo skin) and it's great it doesn't cause any breakouts on my skin either
customer_reviews.author: Fabian perez

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was just bubble wrap and the box it came in was squashed so when I opened it there was a bit of oil already spilling out. Other than the packaging it's a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yadi

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing. It's not greasy at all. I use it 2 times a day after cleansing my face. Love how it absorbs easily. I've seen some improvements in my skin as well. I love the way it makes my face look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: One of the better grapeseed oils out.
customer_reviews.text: I use grapeseed oil for a number of things. To moisture my hair, as a last step in my skin care routine, to lock in moisture right after a shower, mixing in homemade whipped shea butters..and this is one the better grapeseed oils out of the many I've tried. Nice size bottle for the price and its tightly sealed so there's no leakage like most bottled oils tend to have.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: I have pretty bad acne and i was told grape seed oil ...
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty bad acne and i was told grape seed oil can help, you need to make sure its cold pressed or else your wasting your time. I apply this once a day and massage it in my skin for about 20 minutes. I can see a big difference now ( after a week of use) . It kind of makes the pimples stick out less, hard to explain, its like the pimples Ar still there but much less, and the ones i still have Ar less "out there". I highly recommend this to others who suffer from acne.
customer_reviews.author: Nimish

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! After using it for the past few weeks I can definitely see the difference. My face looks so much brighter, healthier, and soft
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Soothing Oil
customer_reviews.text: Convinced that the appropriate facial oil would provide an extra pop of moisture, I have tried several different kinds. This grapeseed oil is the answer for me! It is moisturizing without being greasy, spreads easily but absorbs quickly. Feels so good on dry skin. Works great under mosturizer and/or sunscreen. Great for lips too, no off-putting taste. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the grape seed oil it glides perfectly for a facial, head, and neck massage.

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing to my skin and hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in making a skin care mix along with other oils, and decided to try it out on my hair as well and it is so moisturizing!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Rasheed

customer_reviews.title: Quality carrier oil straight to my door
customer_reviews.text: Its difficult for me to find quality carrier oil in my local stores. I love Maple Holistics carrier oil for my many DIYs I make on a regular basis. I use only the best ingredients in the products i make; I love that Amazon offers Maple Holistics that are shipped to my house within days.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I've became obsessed with many oils ever since I did my research and read the full benefits of oils. I bought this one because I read it was good to use on a daily basis to moisturize skin and prevent the skin from aging. I usually massage my face with it after the gym, and leaves my face completely moisturizer, plus it makes it feel so soft! I mean I know its impossible to prevent the aging stages, but as I read I DO believe that certain oils, for example, the graspeseed oil is a great way to go! This product left me satisfied with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I love this grapeseed oil!!! I use it by itself or with carrier oils. My skin feels so soft and hydrated while using it. It doesn't make your skin feel greasy at all. This is amazing oil on the skin!
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This product helps moisturize both my (caucasian) skin and my son's (black) skin, as well as his hair/scalp. Used right after a shower, it helps lock moisture in the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this oil for about three Months. I no longer have dry skin and my small problem acne spots have disappeared. This stuff is amazing. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: WhitP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this grapeseed oil. It's pure, light, and gets easily absorbed into the skin. I always use this as a daily moisturizer - a little goes a long way. I also use this for hair regrowth/strengthener and nail strengthener! It also works really well on any dry patches of skin. Highly recommend this grapeseed soil!
customer_reviews.author: Toshi

customer_reviews.title: Love what it does to my hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using various products and conditioners to keep my hair nice and moisturized. And as of lately, I've been leaning more towards natural ends, instead of using products with a bunch of chemicals. Grapeseed Oil has worked wonders with my hair and I love it. I mainly use it after I shower at night and when I wake up my hair feels so soft and not oily at all. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tradveler

customer_reviews.title: effective and natural
customer_reviews.text: so far, i've been using this product for 2 weeks as a face oil. really helps with balancing oil on the face and lightening scars, would buy again and recommend to a friend! :) i do wish the bottle had a dropper instead though, it would make application alot easier
customer_reviews.author: Joan Vu

customer_reviews.title: Helps dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Great product for dry skin...I use it on my hair and skin. Definetly feel the difference. Like that it's just oil and no fragrance or other added ingredients.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great product good for many uses, great carrier oil. first time user very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I use it on my aging neck and it is also great for my face. Light, non-greasy and absorbs easily. I will order again to make sure I never run out.

customer_reviews.title: Nice oil
customer_reviews.text: This is the first grapeseed oil I have used, but I like it! Perfect for making an oil blend for face cleaning and moisturizing. I mix it with argan and rosehip and add a couple drops of lavender and tee tree oil. I've been using it for several months now with great results.

customer_reviews.title: I like it !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Always good ..I made purchases before from this company with no issues

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product and great service
customer_reviews.text: High quality and a great price. Great customer service. Will definitely order again from Maple Holistics again.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic oil, I use this for my skin in ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic oil, I use this for my skin in replace of lotions since it is all natural - there is no odor and the consistency of the oil is perfect
customer_reviews.author: jbug

customer_reviews.title: Natural skin care
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my face instead of expensive beauty product lines. My skin has always been on the dry side, so finding a good balance has been a challenge. This absorbs in and doesn't feel greasy. I'm 57 and get compliments all the time on my skin: really think it has made a difference. It's light and odorless. Right combo for me!
customer_reviews.author: SallyBee

customer_reviews.title: but now after applying it daily to my skin i feel like its a beauty product for me
customer_reviews.text: I am 45 now and i am bugging out about looking old and getting wrinkles! So i originally got this for the anti aging purpuse , but now after applying it daily to my skin i feel like its a beauty product for me, it makes my skin feel very soft and healthy and lees stretched all day. So i would recommend this. The bottom line is, this contains grape oil (cold pressed , and that's a important oil for skin.

customer_reviews.title: Grape essential oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this essential oil!!! It moisturizes your skin and leaves it so smooth and silky.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really have a smell, I enjoyed the oil and I think that it has help my face. It also makes a great massage oil. One of the best things about it is how much you pay for how much you get. I was pleasantly surprised and will order more products from this company in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and did not clog pores
customer_reviews.text: I used this product with a mixture of essential oils to clear up my acne prone skin! Amazing product and did not clog pores.

customer_reviews.title: Made my skin feel and look so much better!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for face, hair and skin. Soak up the goodness. I also use it for massages. I’ll definitely be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Grove

customer_reviews.title: Grapeseed Oil works
customer_reviews.text: I have had red discoloration spots on my face. I started using grapeseed oil on those areas and began to notice a difference. I have continued to use this product for months now and I am very pleased with the results. It has literally cleared up the red spots and my skin is being restored. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone with skin problems.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Stewart

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Grapeseed Oil Ever...
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE using this grapeseed oil on my entire body, including my hair. My body is saying thank you, as my skin stays moisturized. The grapeseed has also help with my husband's eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hylton

product_meta.title: Pure Grapeseed Oil for Skin Care - Anti Aging Grape Seed Extract Body Oils for Women and Men Skin Care - Carrier Oil Dry Scalp Treatment for Hair Repair and Vitamin E Hair Growth Oil Hair Moisturizer
feature_bullets: 100% PURE GRAPE SEED OIL: Our Grapeseed oil is 100% pure and contains no impurities or fillers. This allows the antioxidants and fatty acids to provide maxi effectiveness. Apply our pure Grape Seed Oil to your skin or use as carrier oil.

GREAT MASSAGE OIL & SKIN MOISTURIZER: Grapeseed oil has low comedogenicity and will not block pores when applied to the skin. The oil is easily absorbed and has a silky thin texture that does not get greasy during massage sessions. Grapeseed oil also contains high levels of linolic acid which provide skin cells with moisture and healing support. This helps improve the suppleness and vibrancy of the skin. Try Pure Grapeseed Oil for your next massage or send it as a birthday or surprise gift

ANTI AGING - PREVENT WRINKLES & AGE SPOTS: Wrinkles and age spots are mainly caused by overexposure to UV rays. Our Pure Grapeseed Oil contains fatty acids and polyphenols which can prevent premature aging. It also contains vitamins E C and D which promote moisture and help protect the skin from harmful free radicals. Use our cold-pressed Grapeseed Oil to tighten skin and fight signs of aging.

COLD-PRESSED FOR HIGHEST EFFICACY: Unlike many large brands we use only cold-press extraction methods to obtain our grapeseed oil ensuring the inherent vitamins and minerals remain unharmed. This allows us to consistently provide the highest quality grapeseed oil and sets us apart from the competition.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Your purchase is guaranteed by our hassle-free 100% Money-Back Guarantee: If for any reason at all you are unsatisfied with your singular purchase of Maple Holistics Pure Grapeseed Oil you are eligible for a full no-questions-asked refund in its entirety. Expect excellent customer service from a reputed brand who prioritizes customer satisfaction
